comments.author: Dave
comments.body: I saw the first snow on campus last Monday (10/13). It was gone by 10AM, but there was plenty on Flag at noon. Hoping to see more tonight! DU

comments.author: iSean
comments.body: I'm not sure we can believe someone like "DU" (if that is, indeed, your real name). "It snowed! I was right! I'm the master-predictor! ... Oh you want to verify that claim? It... uh... it was totally gone by the time anyone saw it." Good try, but no dice.

comments.author: Dave
comments.body: I must remind iSean that there is precedent. On the very day the somewhat damning Branchflower report was scheduled to hit the bricks in Anchorage, Sarah Palin released a report of her _own_. The result? "_Palin Clears Self._" (I first tried this same approach at age five with a broken vase and an errant Super Ball. Sadly, I hadn't yet fully developed my chops.) So you see, iSean, it can be done. And while I celebrate truth as much as the next guy, I fully realize it has its limits. Thankfully, the Frenzy provides safe refuge for "reality inventors" like myself, a virtual redoubt, if you will, for those of us who know the road to Truth is straight, flat, colorless, and mind-numbingly dull. Sort of a highway to nowhere (wink). DU
